set.name: MSK
set.longname: Myths, Masks, and Minutes Spent Apart

card.name: Expelled
card.text: When Expelled enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. You lose 1 life. Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.

card.name: Dietrich, Fassahd Seer
card.text: Vanishing 3 (This creature enters with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever a counter is removed from Dietrich, for each kind of counter on any number of other target permanents, put another counter of that kind on it or remove one from it.

card.name: Serenity's Guide
card.text: Flying When Serenity's Guide enters, you may put two time counters on target nonland, nonartifact permanent. If it doesn't have vanishing, it gains vanishing. (At the beginning of each of its controller's upkeeps, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, they sacrifice it.)

card.name: Rauchim, Skyfire Celebrant
card.text: Prowess Whenever Rauchim, Skyfire Celebrant attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to Rauchim's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Left Behind
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Left Behind is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, enchanted permanent's controller sacrifices it.

card.name: Brunhild, Unraveled
card.text: Indestructible, haste Brunhild can't block. Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Brunhild, Unraveled.

card.name: Quaint Harvest
card.text: If you control three or fewer lands, exile target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less. Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Veiled Foreboding
card.text: Vigilance When Veiled Foreboding enters, surveil 1, then create a Weapon token. (It's an Equipment with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Fassahd Hunting Party
card.text: When Fassahd Hunting Party enters, choose one — • Remove up to two counters from target permanent you don't control. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Deliverance of Dawn
card.text: Deception {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Flying

card.name: Innocence Denied
card.text: When Innocence Denied enters, exile target nonland permanent you don't control with mana value 3 or less until Innocence Denied leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Keep Moving
card.text: Exile target creature card in your graveyard with mana value 3 or less or target creature you control. Then return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Rousing Sentinel
card.text: Boast — {W}: Exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Ruhe, Season of Silence
card.text: Vigilance, lifelink Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Blade of the Setting Sun
card.text: Boast — {W}: Blade of the Setting Sun gains first strike until end of turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.) Boast — {W}: Until your next turn, noncreature spells cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Together As One
card.text: When Together As One enters, create a 2/2 white Wolf Spirit creature token. Whenever you attack with exactly two creatures, draw a card.

card.name: Dietrich's Regret
card.text: Choose one, then each opponent chooses another one — • Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. • Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less. • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Exile all graveyards.

card.name: Waning Moon Adept
card.text: Whenever another creature you control becomes blocked, you may return it to your hand. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Waning Moon Adept.

card.name: Indifferent Landsknecht
card.text: Deception—Exile a card from your graveyard. Activate the ability of a card named Indifferent Landsknecht only once each turn. (Exile a card from your graveyard, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)

card.name: Disinherited Scion
card.text: Boast—Discard a card: Disinherited Scion gains indestructible until end of turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Gregarious Buboh
card.text: When Gregarious Buboh enters, create a Weapon token. (It's an Equipment with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.") {T}: Target equipped creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Part Missing a Whole
card.text: Flying If damage would be dealt to Part Missing a Whole or a planeswalker you control, prevent 1 of that damage. If it's an Elissia planeswalker, prevent 2 of that damage instead.

card.name: Authority of Dawn
card.text: Deception {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Flying Whenever Authority of Dawn deals combat damage to a player, noncreature spells that player casts cost {2} more to cast until your next turn.

card.name: Escapade Collector
card.text: Vigilance When Escapade Collector enters, create a Weapon token and attach it to a creature you control. When you do, exile up to one target creature you don't control for as long as that Weapon is attached to that creature. (A Weapon is an Equipment with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Memory Bearers
card.text: Vigilance Boast — {2}{W}: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Soaring Paragon
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever Soaring Paragon attacks or blocks, prevent all damage that would be dealt to other creatures you control this turn.

card.name: Zyklinder Herbalist
card.text: Whenever you commune, put a +1/+1 counter on Zyklinder Herbalist. (You commune after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.) {2}{U}: Zyklinder Herbalist gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Fassahd Gustwright
card.text: Flash Flying When Fassahd Gustwright enters, target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Student of Syncopation
card.text: Whenever you commune, you may tap target creature. (You commune after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Mite Errant
card.text: Vanishing 3 (This creature enters with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Mite Errant leaves the battlefield, if it had no time counters on it, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Jaegrin Outrider
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Jaegrin Outrider.

card.name: Misfortune's Steed
card.text: Flash Flying When Misfortune's Steed enters, tap up to one target creature and put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Restless Nights
card.text: Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When the last time counter is removed from Restless Nights, up to one target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Spell Pierce
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Transpose
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If that creature was attacking, surveil 1.

card.name: Belligerent Muckamuck
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each noncreature, nonland card in your graveyard. Belligerent Muckamuck can't be the target of the first spell each player casts each turn. Exile three noncreature, nonland cards from your graveyard: Belligerent Muckamuck can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Season's End Festivalist
Fond Memories
card.text: Vanishing X (This permanent enters with X time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever you remove a time counter from Fond Memories, draw a card.

card.name: Make Trouble
card.text: Choose up to X. X can't be more than the number of creatures you control. • Target player creates two 1/1 blue Goblin creature tokens with prowess. • Counter target activated or triggered ability. • Target player draws a card. • Counter target spell.

card.name: Wanderer's Font
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you've communed this turn, create a 3/3 red Spirit creature token. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.) {1}{U}{U}, Discard Wanderer's Font: Counter target spell.

card.name: Courier of the Tribes
card.text: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Courier of the Tribes: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a permanent you control.

card.name: Irresistible Drums
card.text: When Irresistible Drums enters, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

card.name: Parallel Possibility
card.text: You may have Parallel Possibility enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has vanishing 3 if that creature doesn't have vanishing. (This creature enters with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Season's End Celebrant
card.text: Prowess At the beginning of each end step, if you've communed this turn, create a 1/1 blue Goblin creature token with prowess. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Longing's Maw
card.text: You may pay {U} and exile five cards from your graveyard rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Whenever Longing's Maw attacks, you may exile a card from your graveyard. If you do, tap target creature.

card.name: Unforeseen Illuminator
card.text: Flying {2}{U}: Return Unforeseen Illuminator to its owner's hand.

card.name: Swift Repetition
card.text: Counter target creature spell. You may put a loyalty counter on an Elissia planeswalker you control.

card.name: Proclaim the End
card.text: Surveil 2, then draw a card. At the beginning of each end step, if you've communed this turn, return Proclaim the End from your graveyard to your hand. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Echoes Condemned
card.text: Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

card.name: Carved Histories
card.text: Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Carved Histories, you may return an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dweller in Shadow
card.text: Menace Dweller in Shadow can't block.

card.name: Fall Apart
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control. When you do, each opponent loses 2 life."

card.name: Shambling Canker
card.text: When Shambling Canker enters, target player exiles a card from their hand. If you've sacrificed a permanent this turn, instead they exile a random card from their hand instead.

card.name: Reason to Beware
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you've sacrificed a permanent this turn, surveil 1.

card.name: Needling Lancer
card.text: Flash Flying When Needling Lancer enters, you may pay 2 life. If you do, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Better to Forget
card.text: Target player discards two cards. {1}{B}, Exile Better to Forget from your graveyard: Target player exiles their graveyard.

card.name: Creeping Inadequacy
card.text: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Creeping Inadequacy gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When Creeping Inadequacy dies, you may pay X life, where X is equal to half its power, rounded down. If you do, you draw X cards.

card.name: Custodian of Corpses
card.text: Menace Boast— Pay X life: Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Feeder of Lost Thoughts
card.text: Flying, lifelink When Feeder of Lost Thoughts enters or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If it was from your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Feeder of Lost Thoughts. If it was from an opponent's graveyard, that player discards a card.

card.name: Echo of Agony
card.text: Whenever you lose life, put a +1/+1 counter on Echo of Agony. This ability triggers only once each turn. At the beginning of your end step, if Echo of Agony's power is 5 or greater, draw a card.

card.name: False Flag
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. For each card revealed this way, an opponent may discard a card. If they do, put that card into your graveyard. Otherwise, put it into your hand and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Rhythm of War
card.text: Vanishing 4 (This permanent enters with four time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever you remove a time counter from Rhythm of War, you may return a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the number of time counters on this enchantment from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Doleful Poleman
card.text: Whenever you remove one or more counters from a permanent you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Doleful Poleman. {2}{B}: Remove a counter from target permanent you control.

card.name: Diviner of False Omens
card.text: Lifelink When Diviner of False Omens enters, each opponent that controls more creatures than you sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Tiller of Memories
card.text: Menace, reach Vanishing 2 (This creature enters with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a time counter on Tiller of Memories and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Mender of Mortal Error
card.text: As an additional cost to cast to cast this spell, pay 4 life or sacrifice a creature. Flying Whenever Mender of Mortal Error attacks while a player has 10 or less life, defending player discards a card.

card.name: Rot Begets Regrowth
card.text: Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Rot Begets Regrowth, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wandering Doubt
card.text: Haste Whenever Wandering Doubt attacks, target creature can't block this turn if you've communed this turn. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Lumbering Nomad
card.text: Trample, reach Whenever Lumbering Nomad attacks, put a stun counter on it if you haven't sacrificed a permanent this turn.

card.name: Wandering Worry
card.text: Whenever you commune, Wandering Worry deals 1 damage to each opponent. (You commune after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Roused Elder
card.text: Menace When Roused Elder enters, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dynamic Entry
card.text: If you control three or fewer lands, target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Cycling—Sacrifice a land.

card.name: Rip and Tear
card.text: Rip and Tear deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Sacrifice a land.

card.name: Crestfallen Roseblade
card.text: Haste Whenever Crestfallen Roseblade attacks, it deals 1 damage to each creature you control.

card.name: Reconnaissance Agent
card.text: Deception {R} ({R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Reconnaissance Agent deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, add {R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Flashfire Herald
card.text: Deception—{5}{R}{R}. This costs {1} less to activate for each attacking creature you control. Flying, haste When Flashfire Herald enters, another target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Purgative Rage
card.text: Destroy all artifacts. When you do, Purgative Rage deals damage to up to one target creature equal to the number of artifacts destroyed this way.

card.name: Foraged Arms
Scatterbrained Scamp
card.text: Haste Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Scatterbrained Scamp deals 1 damage to each opponent. If it is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Scatterbrained Scamp.

card.name: Boundary Seer
card.text: Reach, trample {1}{R}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Boundary Seer gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Opulent Settler
card.text: When Opulent Settler enters, create a 2/1 white Warrior creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Wandering Alarm
card.text: Prowess {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Lorn Executioner
card.text: Deception {R} ({R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) When Lorn Executioner enters, discard two cards, then draw two cards.

card.name: From Blood, Blades
card.text: From Blood, Blades deals 2 damage to any target. Create a Weapon token. (It's an Equipment with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Calamitous Whispers
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent or pay {2}. Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

card.name: Light at Season's End
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you've communed this turn, put a trance counter on Light at Season's End. Then it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of trance counters on it. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Quell
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Quell deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Myth Given Voice
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to activate an ability.

card.name: Deepwoods Sentinel
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your end step, if Deepwoods Sentinel attacked and you've communed this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Deepwoods Sentinel. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Custodian of Cycles
card.text: Reach, ward {2} When Custodian of Cycles enters, create a Weapon token. You may attach that token to a creature you control. (It's an Equipment with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Cartographer of History
card.text: When Cartographer of History enters, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Timber Pummeler
card.text: Timber Pummeler gets +1/+0 for each land card in your graveyard. {G}, Pay 2 life, Exile Timber Pummeler from your graveyard: Create a Weapon token. (It's an Equipment with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Student of the Oldest Oak
card.text: Vigilance Student of the Oldest Oak gets +2/+1 as long as you've communed this turn. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Fassahd Lookout
card.text: As as long as you have 10 or less life, Fassahd Lookout has trample and vigilance.

card.name: Never Back Down
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if you have 10 or less life. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Strike from Afar
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. If the creature you don't control has flying, it deals twice that amount of damage instead.

card.name: A New Direction
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Zwiewald Crusher
card.text: When you cast this spell, copy it if you have 5 or less life. Trample, vigilance, reach When Zwiewald Crusher dies, create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Censor of the Veiled
card.text: Reach Whenever you commune, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. (You commune after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Curator of Copses
card.text: Trample Boast — {X}{G}: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Rambunctious Mount
card.text: When Rambunctious Mount enters, put two time counters on each nonland artifact and each nonland enchantment. Nonland artifacts and enchantments that don't have vanishing have vanishing 2. (They enter with two time counters on them. At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, they remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, they sacrifice it.)

card.name: Magniloquent Soulcaller
card.text: Reach Exile a creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost: Create a token that's a copy of that card, except its an Elemental in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Marker of Odd Maps
card.text: Marker of Odd Maps gets +1/+1 for each type noted for it. Whenever a card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, note one of its card types that hasn't been noted by Marker of Odd Maps.

card.name: Stewards of the Fassahd
card.text: Defender, reach, ward {2} Pay 2 life: Stewards of the Fassahd can attack as though it didn't have defender this turn.

card.name: Parsimonious Scamp
card.text: Boast — {1}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Twin Mystagogues
card.text: {T}: Put a loyalty counter on a Kriemhild planeswalker you control. {1}{G}, {T}: You may activate an ability of a planeswalker you control.

card.name: Buboh Shaman
card.text: Boast — {G}: Add three mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of creatures and artifacts. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Corpseborn Verdant
card.text: Trample {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Corpseborn Verdant gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Devoted of Zwiewald
card.text: This spell costs {3} less if you've communed this turn. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.) Trample, ward {3}

card.name: Untamed Capacity of Growth
card.text: Trample {1}{G}: Exile Untamed Capacity of Growth from your hand with three time counters on it. It gains "Whenever you commune, if this card is exiled with time counters on it, remove a time counter from it. Then if it has no more time counters on it, cast it without paying its mana cost." (You commune after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Hostile Watch
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to twice its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

card.name: Harken the Past
card.text: Choose one. If you have 10 or less life, choose any number instead. • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target player's graveyard.

card.name: Revenge of the Zwiewald
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature or planeswalker. As long as you have four or more cards in your graveyard, Revenge of the Zwiewald has flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Ziel, Season of Endings
card.text: Protection from tokens At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a nonlegendary, nontoken permanent. If they sacrificed a creature, they create a 1/1 blue Elemental creature token with flying. If they sacrificed a land, they create a Treasure token. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on Ziel.

card.name: Crowned Croaker
card.text: Trample Boast — {R}{G}: Crowned Croaker gets +2/+1 until end of turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.) Whenever Crowned Croaker deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.

card.name: Lessons Learned and Trials Won
card.text: Whenever you commune, target creature you control gains trample and lifelink until end of turn. (You commune after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.) {3}{G}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Invigorating Discovery
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Goblin creature token with prowess. Whenever three or more Goblins you control attack, you may exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. You may cast a copy of it. (You still pay costs.)

card.name: Magali, At Home Anywhere
card.text: Flash At the beginning of your end step, if you've communed this turn, create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary permanent you control. (You've communed after spending at least three mana activating abilities each turn.)

card.name: Kriemhild, Unbidden End
card.text: Menace Whenever Kriemhild attacks, you may mill two cards. If you do, you lose 2 life and you may return a card milled this way to your hand. As long as you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, Kriemhild gets +3/+3.

card.name: Galvanized Ink
card.text: Galvanized Ink deals 3 damage to any target. Flashback {3}{U}{R}. This spell costs {3} less to cast this way if you've cast another noncreature spell this turn. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Odd-Eyed Animist
card.text: Lifelink When Odd-Eyed Animist enters, you may sacrifice a permanent. When you do, you may destroy target nonland permanent that shares a type with that permanent.

card.name: Erkinder Explorer
card.text: Flash When Erkinder Explorer enters, tap up to one target nonland permanent and put a stun counter on it. It loses all abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Behold Ruhigwelt
card.text: Create an X/X green Avatar creature token, where X is the number of land cards in your graveyard. Flashback—{R}{G}, Sacrifice a land. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Witness to Many Ends
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Create a 3/3 red Spirit creature token. It can't block this turn.

card.name: Fatesplicer
card.text: Reach Vanishing 3 (This creature enters with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Fatesplicer dies, you may return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Boasting Rootwalla
card.text: You may cast this spell without paying its mana cost if you've activated a boast ability this turn. Boast — {G}{W}: Boasting Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Fool's Errand
card.text: Pay X life: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. X is equal to 2 plus the number of times you've activated this ability this turn.

card.name: Breitmeer Delver
card.text: Trample, ward {2} Boast — {1}{G}{U}: Breitmeer Delver becomes an X/X creature until end of turn, where X is the power of target attacking creature. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Cryptic Pioneer
card.text: When Cryptic Pioneer enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

card.name: Far-Flung Voyager
card.text: Whenever Far-Flung Voyager attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Steward of New Horizons
card.text: Reach When Steward of New Horizons enters, you gain 2 life, then you create a Weapon token. (It's an Equipment with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Flowing Blade
Skull of Titan's Past
card.text: {T}: Target player mills a card. {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard.

card.name: Apotropaic Maw
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. {1}, Sacrifice Apotropaic Maw: Exile target player's graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Assimilated Explorer
card.text: Flying When Assimilated Explorer enters, you may discard a card. If you do, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Longshot Resident

Whenever the last time counter is removed from Trunk of Fallen Friends, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: From Hope to Action
card.text: Creatures you control have "Boast — {2}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." (Activate only if that creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.) Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may activate one of its boast abilities without paying its costs. (You can't activate the same boast ability twice in a turn.)

card.name: Secret Histories
card.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Choose the name of target nonland card in a graveyard if Secret Histories wasn't kicked. Otherwise, choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the chosen name. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.
